name: Prison Test
description: This is a test game in which you can learn life in the russian prison, prison customs, prison riddles and answers to them, find out who are the prisoners and what they are in prison for, learn the articles and so on.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 10 MB available space Additional Notes: minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
